control.description-key: Interactive timeline that surfaces Dataverse audit events, grouped changes, and user activity.

property.name: value
property.description-key: Record (GUID) passed in by the table to scope the audit query.

property.name: pageSize
property.description-key: Maximum number of audit entries retrieved per request.

property.name: showLoadMore
property.description-key: Shows the Load More button when additional audit rows are available.

property.name: includeChangeData
property.description-key: Includes field-level change details for each audit entry.

property.name: height
property.description-key: Optional fixed control height in pixels.

property.name: enableSort
property.description-key: Enables column sorting within the audit grid.

property.name: enableColumnSizing
property.description-key: Allows users to resize grid columns.
